market trends.description: Conduct real-time research on market trends by going through various financial websites. Make sure to write a well defined report between 300-500 words in a clear and concise way
market trends.expected_output: A detailed report summarizing key findings on market trends, highlighting important insights. Proper subheadings might be used. Report should be 300-500 words

news.description: Conduct real-time research on news by going through various financial websites. Find different news on investment companies, assets, deposits, etc. Make sure to write a well defined report between 300-500 words in a clear and concise way
news.expected_output: A detailed report summarizing key findings on news, highlighting important insights. Proper subheadings might be used. Report should be formatted between 300-500 words

social media.description: Conduct real-time research on social media by going through various social media websites. Find different sentiments on investment companies, assets, deposits, etc. Make sure to write a well defined report between 300-500 words in a clear and concise way
social media.expected_output: A detailed report summarizing key findings on social media sentiments, highlighting important insights. Proper subheadings might be used. Report should be formatted between 300-500 words
